Rogers Park car crash injures 5 - including 2 critically

09-01-2023 3:35 AM

CHICAGO - Five people are in the hospital after a man hit a car and drove through a red light, causing another car crash, in Rogers Park Sunday evening. According to the Chicago Police Department, the crash happened around 6:19 p.m. in the 1900 block of West Touhy Avenue when a 28-year-old...

Homeland Security Secretary Mayorkas dismisses Republican calls to resign over the border

08-01-2023 9:30 PM

ABC News (WASHINGTON) - Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas on Sunday rebuffed calls from leading Republicans to step aside - or risk impeachment - and underscored the critical nature of managing migration challenges "gripping" the Western Hemisphere. In an interview...
